message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase a truly unique and valuable asset.  It's something that has the potential to greatly enhance your business and I believe it's worth at least $2000000. To demonstrate my confidence in its value, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000. This is a significant discount from what I believe it's worth. Let me know if you're interested and we can discuss further.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in this product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider a price up to $1000000. I would like to make a counteroffer at this amount.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While $1000000 is significantly below what I believe this product is worth, I'm willing to compromise. I'm confident that this asset will be a valuable addition to your business. To show my commitment to working with you, I'm willing to lower my price to $1250000. This is a fair price that considers your budget and my desire to see this product in the right hands.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value I place on this product and my budget, I would like to counteroffer at $1100000. This amount reflects a compromise between our positions and I believe it represents a fair value for both of us.
